name: Whale Rehab
description:
This is a demo of Whale Rehab, a game where you play as a mobile game player in a game called Vota Orca.

What you can do in Vota Orca :

- Roll new cards  ( *From Vota Orca leakers, there will be two new cards out on 5th Dec and 25th dec. Maybe you should save up till then? )

- Do daily tasks

- Fish for baits (Grind basically)

This is a game about moderation to live life to the fullest. For people with impulsive purchasing habits, made by a person with impulsive purchasing habits.

(I spent most of my time creating and coding, so the math part like conversion rates might not make sense!)

Credits :

Art by me (Heavy References to Genshin Impact and Cookie run for Parody Purposes.)

Audio -

Main BGM :  Sugar Free by Lee Sing Huey, Wowsound (Paid)

SFX : Freesound
